This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://x.com/PETEandrepete_/status/1788379241815445981](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fx.com%2FPETEandrepete_%2Fstatus%2F1788379241815445981) ### Comment > I use the app “Downie” https://software.charliemonroe.net/downie/ to download audio, video, and images from various websites. One such was of starting a download is to paste the URL of a page that contains the item you want to download. > > This works 100% of the time for everything EXCEPT Twitter. Excuse me, X.com. > > So say I want to download this gif of a tornado that I just tweeted. Disable it and you can now use either x.com or twitter.com URLs. > > A while back I THOUGHT i had nailed this down as being related to DNS Protection, which i had been using at the time.
